jobInfo.address: 北京朝阳区SOHO现代城A座3013室

brandComInfo.introduce:
从事WOFE 和外资代表处相关工作很多年，有很丰富的经验，可以从事从客户一开始产生公司设立想法到投资咨询，监督与咨询其公司注册、并购、帐务处理、财务顾问、税务顾问、尽职调查、整体公司注销等所可能发生的与贵公司紧密联系的一系列问题。

We are a professional financial outsourcing firm. In the WOFE and foreign office related work for many years, has a wealth of experience, can be engaged in the company began to set up idea to investment advisory from the customer, a series of problems in close contact with your company and its possible supervision consulting company registration,acquisition, accounting, financial advisers, tax consultant, due diligence, the cancellation of the whole company.



我们以多年的财务和信息化管理经验，对企业的财务管理现状进行系统的调研、分析和诊断，提出企业财务管理优化解决方案。全方位为企业提供财务管理咨询。

We have many years of financial and information management experience, the enterprise's financial management status of the system of investigation, analysis and diagnosis, put forward the enterprise financial management optimization solution. Provide financial management consulting for all enterprises。

以多年的财务外包、运营财务、尽职调查、公司注销等管理经验全方位为企业提供️SAAS财务软件进行中、英文互换财务外包服务，可以中、英文随时查询公司财务状况。我们只针对人数在100人以下、年营业额1个亿元以下、月业务交易笔数1000笔以下的中小型公司。

With years of financial outsourcing, financial operations, due diligence, the cancellation of the company management experience for the enterprise to provide the full range of up SAAS financial software, English exchange of financial outsourcing services, can, at any time the company's financial situation English. We only aim at small and medium companies with fewer than 100 people, less than 1 hundred million yuan in annual turnover and 1000 per month business transactions.
